metadata.subject: Holbach, Paul Henri Thiry, baron d', 1723-1789
Fréret, Nicolas, 1688-1749
Voltaire, 1694-1778
Prohibited books
metadata.title: Extrait des registres du Parlement du dix-huit août, mil sept cent soixante-dix
metadata.creator: France.Parlement (Paris)
France. Parlement (Paris)
metadata.call_number: Case Wing folio Z144 .A1 v. 8 no. 32
metadata.publisher: A Paris : Chez P.G. Simon, Imprimeur du Parlement ...
metadata.description: Orders the burning of the following works: Baron d'Holbach's Le christianisme dévoilé, La contagion sacrée, and Système de la nature, and his translation, Discours sur les miracles de Jésus-Christ ... traduit ... de Voolston [i.e. Woolston], and Examen impartial des principales religions du monde (also attributed to d'Holbach); Nicolas Freret's Examen critique des apologistes de la religion chrétienne; and Voltaire's Dieu et les hommes
metadata.notes: No copyright page found. No table-of-contents pages found. Damaged, torn, stained and/or loose pages. Uneven binding. Skewed text. Irregular pagination. Title page and cover are combined.
